ygData.subject: Weapons on Pets
ygData.msgSnippet: That reminds me....I ve heard that pet s have a static delay time when swinging... If this is true...then wouldn t it be great to hand your pet a weighted axe?
ygData.messageBody:
That reminds me....I've heard that pet's have a static delay time when
swinging...

If this is true...then wouldn't it be great to hand your pet a weighted axe?
50 dam 150 delay ( i think these are the stats )

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Nygaardr, FC3 [SMTP:nygaardr@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 5:44 AM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
>
> Yeah, I said they made good pet weapons. Never said a player of any lvl
> should use them.
>
> Mu
>
> -----Original Message-----
> From: IT3 Adam J. Daingerfield [mailto:persona@...]
> Sent: Friday, April 13, 2001 2:44 AM
> To: 'EverQuest@yahoogroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [EverQuest] Strategies
>
>
> Just stating I'd rather that my weapon/armor knocked em dead on the battle
> field then in a fashion show :> (sorry my TRY at wit)
>
> >On a side note the Kobolds near the king, maybe other places too I'm not
> > sure, drop some of THE BEST looking weapons in the game. Stats not too
> > good about like FS but the looks are great.
>
